metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26934 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: phpMyAdmin before 4.9.6 and 5.x before 5.0.3 allows XSS through the transformation feature via a crafted link. It was discovered that phpMyAdmin was vulnerable to an XSS attack. If a victim were to click on a crafted link, an attacker could run malicious JavaScript on the victim's system.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> vulerability was introduced in 2.5.0. File where issue is is different in bionic and earlier.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.7+dfsg1-1').
